name: Unique Mover
description:
======================================================

You. Moving. Furniture. 

One Button. Try to go for a Highscore. Good luck.

=====================================================

This game was made for the Boundless GameJam of 2021. I only had max 20% available due to work of the 7 days  given to make the game, and I'm quite an amateur at this. I'm happy with it though! If you get through the game, post your Highscore!
